overview: First generation industrial music as conceptual performance: smashing, wrecking, and destroying everything. The glorious entropic breakthrough of The Hatersâ€™ youth...In all, there are 23 segments adding up to about two hours of material, spanning the years from 80s to mid-90s with a handful of later dates, the latest being the 20th anniversary show. -John Wiese
title: The Haters Live!
